column2: ENGLISH
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite arming sword. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite longsword. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite sword. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him
sword_tier_1
A common sword worn by many battles with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on the hilt.
sword_tier_2
A longsword of fine steel with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on the hilt. A capable sword that has inflicted great damage on its foes.
sword_tier_3_heartseeker
A high quality sword with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest inlaid. Named after its ability to pierce any armor, it is sure to bring enemies to a swift fate.
sword_tier_3_vengeance
Forged with the finest steel available and inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, the sword was named Vengeance, to bring certain doom to any traitor.
sword_tier_3_fury

A great and magnificent sword inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and known as Fury. Swift in hand-to-hand combat as well as battle, it is sure to bring victory to the one who wields it.

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite scimitar. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite fine scimitar. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite scimitar. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Scimitar
A scimitar of finer quality than your common blade with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on the hilt.
Fine Scimitar
A well-forged blade with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on the hilt that can stand against most weapons.
The Golden Scimitar

Named The Golden Scimitar, it is a weapon of exceptional quality forged by a master craftsman. The handle is adorned with ornaments made of gold, jewels and the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
Scimitar of Fortune
A blade of the finest steel and a handle inlaid with gold and the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. Named the Scimitar of Fortune, it is said to bestow the owner with luck.
Scimitar of Conquest
Forged by the best of craftsmen, the Scimitar of Conquest is a blade of victory and triumph. Both handle and hilt are covered in diamonds as well as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite lance. Once a constant presence at every tourney it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite two-handed lance. Once a constant presence at every tourney it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite lance. Once a constant presence at every tourney it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Lance
A wooden lance with a metal tip attached and the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on it, used by cavalry in combat.
Two-handed Lance

With a longer lance, you can keep your distance from the enemy while still being able to strike a lethal blow. Although this will make it harder for them to see the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on it.
The Impaler
A heavy lance named The Impaler with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on it. The weight alone will allow it to impale any lightly armored opponent during a charge.
The Trident
Named The Trident, this lance is equipped with a long and heavy metal tip of the finest steel engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
The Piercer
Crafted to be long, yet sturdy, with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on it. The Piercer will make short work of any enemy foolish enough to stand in your way.

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite throwing axe. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite battle axe. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] back it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite axe. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] back it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Throwing Axe
A small and well-crafted axe commonly used in both melee combat and for throwing with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest on the hilt.
Battle Axe
A larger battle axe is able to give more cleaving power, making it more effective against armored foes. It is engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
Cleaver
A mighty battle axe named Cleaver engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. The size alone will make it easy to shred your opponents with a single strike.
Ravager
A long double bladed axe named Ravager engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. Crafted with high quality steel, the axe will wreak havoc among your enemies.
Marauder

Named Marauder and engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, this exceptionally light weighted and well-crafted battle axe allows you to lay waste to your enemies without getting exhausted yourself.

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite mace. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite iron mace. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite mace. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Mace
A mace made of an iron head mounted on a wooden shaft engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
Iron Mace
A mace forged entirely out of iron that allow for more powerful blows inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
The Foe Hammer
The Foe Hammer is a gigantic and well-balanced two handed mace that will make short work of any foe, armored or not. The [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest sits proudly on the head.
The Bone Breaker
Known as The Bone Breaker, this two handed mace has a large and heavy head able to crush all opponents with its weight. The [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest sits proudly on the head.
The Shatterer
A large mace with spikes mounted on the head, named The Shatterer. For it will shatter your enemies, in both mind and body. The [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest sits proudly on the head.

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite self bow. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] back it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite composite bow. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] back it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite bow. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] back it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Self Bow
A bow made from a single piece of fine wood engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest..
column3: Un arc fait à partir d'un seul morceau de bois.
column4: Ein Bogen, der aus einem einzigen Stück Holz hergestellt wurde.
column6: Un arco hecho de una única pieza de madera refinada.

column2: Composite Bow

Composite bows are constructed with a wooden core, glued together with horn and sinew. Allowing for a smaller bow with greater power. This one is engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Les arcs composites sont conçus avec une base en bois sur laquelle sont collés de la corne et du tendon, et sont plus petits tout en étant plus puissants.
column4: Ein Kompositbogen besteht aus einem Holzkern, der mit Kleber, Horn und Sehnen erweitert wird. Mit dieser Technik sind kleinere Bögen mit höherer Schusskraft möglich.
column6: Los arcos compuestos se fabrican con un cuerpo de madera encolado con hueso y tendones. Es un arco más pequeño con mayor potencia.

column2: Silent Wind
A composite bow of the highest quality and engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. It is named Silent Wind for being able to silently dispatch enemies.
column3: Un arc composite de la plus haute qualité. Il est nommé Vent Silencieux pour être en mesure d'abattre silencieusement les ennemis.
column4: Ein Kompositbogen der besten Qualität. Der Name "Stiller Wind" deutet auf seine Fähigkeit hin, Feinde lautlos auszuschalten.
column6: Un arco compuesto de gran calidad. Se llama Viento Silencioso porque es capaz de despachar a los enemigos sin hacer ruido.

column2: Lightning
Named Lightning and engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, this bow fire arrows with incredible force. Killing opponents in an instant.
column3: Nommé l'Éclair, cet arc tire des flèches de feu à une vitesse incroyable, tuant les adversaires en un instant.
column4: Trifft sein Ziel mit der Wucht eines Blitzes, daher der Name.
column6: Este arco, conocido como Relámpago, lanza flechas con una fuerza increíble, lo que mata a los oponentes en un instante.

column2: Eagle
Engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and known simply as Eagle. This exceptional bow can strike enemies at great distances with considerable precision.
column3: Connu simplement comme l'Aigle. Cet arc exceptionnel peut frapper des ennemis très éloignés avec une précision considérable.
column4: Dieser außerordentliche Bogen schießt mit beträchtlicher Genauigkeit selbst über weiteste Entfernungen.
column6: Este arco excepcional, conocido como Águila, puede atacar a los enemigos a gran distancia con una precisión considerable.

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite chain mail. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite splint mail. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite armor. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Chain Mail Armor
A basic set of armor made up of many small metal rings linked together. The [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest is painted in the center.
column3: Une armure basique composée de nombreux petits anneaux en métal reliés entre eux.
column4: Eine einfache Rüstung, die aus vielen kleinen Metallringen, die miteinander verbunden sind, besteht.
column6: Una armadura básica compuesta por muchos anillitos de metal unidos.

column2: Splint Mail Armor
More advanced than chain mail, this set of armor has plates of solid metal, inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, attached among the metal rings to protect vital weak spots.
column3: Plus avancée que la cotte de mailles, cette armure comporte des plaques de métal solide attachées entre les anneaux métalliques pour protéger les points vitaux.
column4: Fortgeschrittener als die Kettenrüstung, besteht diese Rüstung aus massiven Metallplatten, die unter den Metallringen befestigt sind, um wichtige Stellen des Körpers zu schützen.
column6: Más avanzada que la cota de malla, esta armadura tiene placas de metal unidas con anillos de metal para proteger puntos vitales.

column2: Guardian
This strong and sturdy set of armor, inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest offers unmatched protection in combat. It truly is the guardian of those it encases.
column3: Cette armure robuste offre une protection inégalée au combat. C'est vraiment le gardien de celui qui la porte.
column4: Diese starke und stabile Rüstung bietet einen unübertroffenen Schutz im Kampf. Sie ist wahrlich der Wächter all jener die sie tragen.
column6: Esta armadura fuerte y resistente ofrece protección sin igual en el combate. Es ciertamente guardián de lo que recubre.

column2: Champion
Designed to strike fear into the hearts of men and inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, this suit of armor safeguards its bearer so they can charge into the fields of battle.
column3: Conçu pour frapper la peur dans les cœurs des hommes, cette armure protège son porteur pour pouvoir mener une charge sur le champs de bataille.
column4: Entworfen, um Angst in die Herzen ihrer Gegner zu schlagen, schützt diese Rüstung ihrer Träger, damit sie sich in die Schlacht stürzen können.
column6: Diseñada para infundir miedo en la gente, esta armadura protege a su portador para que pueda cargar en el campo de batalla.

column2: Warden
Forged out of the finest materials and with expert craftsmanship, this armor, inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, turns its owner into a stalwart barrier against any foe.
column3: Forgé avec les meilleurs matériaux et avec un savoir-faire expert, cette armure transforme son propriétaire en une barrière inflexible contre tout ennemi.
column4: Aus den feinsten Materialien geschmiedet und mit fachmännischer Handwerkskunst zusammengesetzt, verwandelt diese Rüstung ihren Besitzer in eine unüberwindbare Barriere gegen jeden Feind.
column6: Forjada con los mejores materiales y habilidad experta, esta armadura convierte a su dueño en una barrera inquebrantable contra cualquier enemigo.

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite scepeter. Once a constant presence in [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hand it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite sword. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite scepter. Once a constant presence in [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hand it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite sword. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite scepter. Once a constant presence in [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hand it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite sword. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him
The Crown of Majesty

The hooped crown is made from gold, inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.
column3: La couronne est faite d'or et décorée de pierres précieuses de l'étranger – émeraudes, rubis, saphirs et diamants – les plus beaux sont de la taille d'œufs de cailles.
column4: Die Reifkrone besteht aus Gold und ist mit fremdartigen Edelsteinen wie zum Beispiel Smaragden, Rubinen, Saphiren und Diamanten verziert, von denen die prächtigsten so groß wie Wachteleier sind.
column6: Esta corona cerrada está hecha de oro y decorada con piedras preciosas foráneas (esmeraldas, rubíes, zafiros y diamantes) del tamaño de huevos de codorniz.

column2: Emerald Scepter

This scepter emgraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest is famed for the unusual amount and quality of emeralds adorning it. The origins of the stones are shrouded in mysteries, the tales are as numerous as the stars.
column3: Ce sceptre est célèbre pour la quantité et la qualité inhabituelles des émeraudes qui l'ornent. Les origines des pierres sont enveloppées de mystères, les récits sont aussi nombreux que les étoiles.
column4: Dieses Zepter ist für die ungewöhnliche Menge und Qualität der Smaragde berühmt, mit denen es geschmückt ist. Die Herkunft dieser Edelsteine ist in Geheimnisse gehüllt und die Geschichten darüber sind so zahlreich wie die Sterne.
column6: Este cetro es famoso por la inusual cantidad y calidad de las esmeraldas que lo adornan. La procedencia de las piedras está rodeada de misterio hay tantas historias al respecto como estrellas.

column2: Sword of Heroes

This ornamental weapon inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest is an impressive sight. The blade is gilded and the hilt is adorned with foreign precious stones, such as rubies and sapphires, and agate cameos depicting legendary warriors.
column3: Cette arme ornementale est impressionnante. La lame est dorée et la poignée est ornée de pierres précieuses de l'étranger, comme des rubis et des saphirs, et des camées d'agate représentant des guerriers légendaires.
column4: Diese ornamentale Waffe bietet einen beeindruckenden Anblick. Die Klinge ist vergoldet und das Heft mit fremdartigen Edelsteinen wie zum Rubinen und Saphiren sowie Achatgemmen geschmückt, auf denen legendäre Krieger abgebildet sind.
column6: Esta arma ornamental es una imagen impresionante. La hoja es dorada y la empuñadura está adornada con piedras preciosas foráneas como rubíes y zafiros, y camafeos de ágata que retratan a guerreros legendarios.

column2: Crown of Pearls

Every inch of this golden hooped golden crown is covered in pearls of all sizes, complemented by sapphires, as well as cameos depicting religious characters and the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest engraved in mother-of-pearl.
column3: Chaque pouce de cette couronne d'or est recouvert de perles de toutes tailles, complétées par des saphirs, ainsi que des camées représentant des personnages religieux gravés en nacre.
column4: Jeder Zentimeter dieser goldenen Reifkrone ist mit Perlen in allen Größen bedeckt, die durch Saphire sowie durch Gemmen ergänzt werden, auf denen in Perlmutt eingravierte religiöse Charaktere abgebildet sind.
column6: Esta corona cerrada de oro está cubierta en su totalidad de perlas de todos los tamaños, complementadas con zafiros, así como con camafeos grabados en nácar que representan personajes religiosos.

column2: Ruby Scepter
This golden scepter engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and adorned with opals, almandines and pearls, is crowned by an impressively big and lustrous ruby.
column3: Ce sceptre d'or, orné d'opales, d'almandins et de perles, est couronné d'un rubis impressionnant et brillant.
column4: Dieses mit Opalen, Almandinen und Perlen geschmückte goldene Zepter ist an der Spitze mit einem beeindruckend großen schimmernden Rubin besetzt.
column6: Este cetro dorado, adornado con ópalos, almandinos y perlas, está coronado con un rubí de un tamaño imponente.

column2: Golden Sword

This gilded blade and hilt, engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest while useless in battle, will impress their holders every subject. The pommel is decorated with a single, magnificent emerald.
column3: Cette épée à la lame dorée et la poignée dorées, bien qu'inutile dans la bataille, impressionnera chaque sujet de son détenteur. Le pommeau est décoré d'une seule et magnifique émeraude.
column4: Diese vergoldete Klinge mit vergoldetem Heft taugt zwar nicht zum Kämpfen, macht jedoch einen gewaltigen Eindruck auf die Untertanen seines Eigentümers. Der Knauf ist mit einem prächtigen Smaragd verziert.
column6: Esta hoja dorada y su empuñadura, aunque inútiles para la guerra, impresionarán a todos los súbditos de su propietario. El pomo está decorado con una esmeralda magnífica.

column2: Crown of Lilies

The mass of garnets and opals are truly made justice by the silver and gilded base of this crown. The model is an open one with four stylized lilies each depicting the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: La base argentée et dorée de cette couronne rend véritablement justice à la quantité de grenats et d'opales. Le modèle est ouvert avec quatre lys stylisés.
column4: Der Menge an Granaten und Opalen wird die silberne und vergoldete Basis dieser Krone wahrhaft gerecht. Es handelt sich um ein offenes Modell mit vier stilisierten Lilien.
column6: La plata y la base dorada hacen justicia a los granates y a los ópalos de esta corona. Este es un tipo de corona abierta con cuatro finos lirios.

column2: Noble Scepter
This scepter signifies its holder's right to rule. The gilded rod engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest is adorned with pearls and garnets.
column3: Ce sceptre signifie un droit pour son détenteur à régner. La tige dorée est ornée de perles et de grenats.
column4: Dieses Zepter versinnbildlicht den Herrschaftsanspruch des Eigentümers. Der vergoldete Stab ist mit Perlen und Granaten geschmückt.
column6: Este cetro representa el derecho de su propietario a gobernar. La vara dorada está adornada con perlas y granates.

column2: Engraved Sword
This sword will not bring its bearer much luck on the battlefield, but the adorned blade and gilded hilt, proudly bearing the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, is a beautiful sight indeed.
column3: Cette épée n'apportera pas beaucoup de chance au porteur sur le champ de bataille, mais la lame ornée et la poignée dorée sont assurément agréables à regarder.
column4: Dieses Schwert bringt zwar seinem Besitzer auf dem Schlachtfeld nicht viel Glück, aber die verzierte Klinge und das vergoldete Heft bieten einen herrlichen Anblick.
column6: Esta espada no traerá demasiada suerte a su propietario en el campo de batalla, pero su hoja adornada y empuñadura dorada son hermosas.

column1: ###Muslim sets & west african sets (daggers also indian)###

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite dagger. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite bracelets. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] arms it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite dagger. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite bracelets. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] arms it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite dagger. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHerHim] it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite bracelets. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] arms it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Dagger of Glory

This dagger, with its gilded blade and heavily adorned hilt, radiates power. Gleaming rubies, garnets and diamonds are placed in the pattern of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest along the hilt.
column3: Cette dague, avec sa lame dorée et sa poignée lourdement ornée, rayonne de puissance. Des rubis brillants, des grenats et des diamants sont placés dans des motifs tourbillonnants le long de la poignée.
column4: Dieser Dolch mit vergoldeter Klinge und prunkvoll geschmücktem Knauf strahlt Macht aus. Entlang des Hefts sind in Wirbelmustern gleißende Rubine, Granate und Diamanten angebracht.
column6: Esta daga, con su cuchilla dorada y una empuñadura ricamente adornada, irradia poder. Rubíes brillantes, granates y diamantes están dispuestos en remolinos a lo largo de la empuñadura.

column2: Ruby Bracelets
These golden bracelets are decorated with rubies and engraved pieces of ivory as well as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Ces bracelets en or sont ornés de rubis et de morceaux d'ivoire.
column4: Diese goldenen Armreife sind mit Rubinen und graviertem Elfenbein verziert.
column6: Estos brazaletes dorados están decorados con rubíes y piezas de marfil tallado.

column2: Bejeweled Dagger

The finely crafted dagger engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest has a pommel set with sapphires and amethysts. The hilt is decorated with elaborately embroidered patterns in gold and silver threads.
column3: La dague finement travaillée a un pommeau serti de saphirs et d'améthystes. La poignée est décorée de motifs élaborés brodés en fils d'or et d'argent.
column4: Der meisterhaft angefertigte Dolch hat einen mit Saphiren und Amethysten besetzten Knauf. Das Heft ist mit kunstfertig eingelegten Mustern von Fäden aus Gold und Silber verziert.
column6: La daga, finamente elaborada, tiene un pomo con zafiros y amatistas engarzados. La empuñadura está decorada con elaborados patrones bordados con hilos de oro y plata.

column2: Golden Bracelets
A set of heavy gold bracelets with intricate engravings and filigree including the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Un ensemble de lourds bracelets d'or avec des gravures complexes et filigranes.
column4: Ein Satz schwerer Armreife aus Gold mit kunstvollen Gravuren und feiner Filigranarbeit.
column6: Un conjunto de pesadas pulseras de oro macizo con complejos grabados y filigranas.

column2: Engraved Dagger

Intricate patterns including the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and famous poems are engraved into the blade of this dagger. Its hilt is embroidered with silver thread and adorned with opals and pearls.
column3: Des motifs complexes et des poèmes célèbres sont gravés dans la lame de ce poignard. Sa poignée est brodée de fil d'argent et ornée d'opales et de perles.
column4: In die Klinge dieses Dolchs sind kunstvolle Muster und berühmte Gedichte eingraviert. Sein Heft ist mit Silberfäden verziert und mit Opalen und Perlen geschmückt.
column6: La hoja de esta daga está grabada con elaborados patrones y poemas famosos. Su empuñadura está bordada con hilo plateado y adornada con ópalos y perlas.

column2: Silver Bracelets
These heavy silver bracelets are beautifully engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and adorned with ivory and glimmering crystals.
column3: Ces lourds bracelets en argent sont magnifiquement gravés et ornés d'ivoire et de cristaux scintillants.
column4: Diese schweren Armreife aus Silber sind mit herrlichen Gravuren, Elfenbein und schimmernden Kristallen geschmückt.
column6: Estos brazaletes de plata maciza están bellamente grabados y adornados con marfil y cristales relucientes.

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite necklace. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] neck it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite necklace. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] neck it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite necklace. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] neck it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Celestial Necklace

With its dozens upon dozens of diamonds and sapphires, this necklace is as beautiful as the night sky itself. Its centerpiece is a marvelous, walnut-sized blue diamond engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Avec ses dizaines de diamants et de saphirs, ce collier est aussi beau que le ciel nocturne lui-même. Sa pièce maîtresse est un merveilleux diamant bleu de la taille d'une noix.
column4: Diese Halskette mit Dutzenden und Aberdutzenden von Diamanten und Saphiren ist so schön wie der Nachthimmel selbst. Das Kernstück bildet ein prächtiger blauer Diamant, der so groß wie eine Walnuss ist.
column6: Con sus cientos de diamantes y zafiros, este collar es más hermoso que el cielo nocturno. Su pieza central es un maravilloso diamante azul del tamaño de una nuez.

column2: Necklace of Radiance
Engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest when the light hits it, the gold and rubies of this necklace sparkle as if on fire.
column3: Lorsque la lumière le frappe, l'or et les rubis de ce collier scintillent comme si c'était en feu.
column4: Wenn das Licht auf diese Halskette fällt, funkeln ihr Gold und ihre Rubine, als würden sie brennen.
column6: Cuando le da la luz, el oro y los rubíes de este collar resplandecen como si estuvieran ardiendo.

column2: Collar of Pearls
Hoops upon hoops of pearls engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest create the base for this necklace. An extra dimension is added to the piece by a dozen pea-sized amethysts.
column3: Des cercles de perles créent la base pour ce collier. Une dimension supplémentaire est ajoutée à la pièce par une douzaine d'améthystes de la taille de pois.
column4: Mehrere Reifen von Perlen bilden die Basis dieser Halskette, und ein Dutzend Amethyste in Erbsengröße verleihen dem Werk eine zusätzliche Dimension.
column6: Aros y aros de perlas forman la base de este collar. Una docena de amatistas de pequeño tamaño le añaden volumen.

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite circlet. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite staff. Once a constant presence in [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hand it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite circlet. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite staff. Once a constant presence in [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hand it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite circlet. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him
On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you his favorite staff. Once a constant presence in [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hand it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Heavenly Circlet
This majestic circlet is adorned with golden wings and uncommonly big and lustrous sapphires engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Ce majestueux anneau est orné d'ailes d'or et de saphirs exceptionnellement grands et chatoyants.
column4: Dieser majestätische Reif ist mit goldenen Flügeln und außergewöhnlich großen, schimmernden Saphiren geschmückt.
column6: Esta majestuosa diadema está adornada con alas doradas y zafiros extraordinariamente grandes y lustrosos.

column2: Staff of Majesty
This heavy gilded staff is engraved with scenes from ancient tales as well as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and adorned with both emeralds and ivory.
column3: Ce lourd bâton doré est gravé de scènes de contes anciens et orné d'émeraudes et d'ivoire.
column4: Dieser schwere vergoldete Stab ist mit eingravierten Szenen aus alten Sagen verziert und mit Smaragden und Elfenbein geschmückt.
column6: Este bastón de oro macizo está grabado con escenas de cuentos antiguos y adornado con esmeraldas y marfil.

column2: Circlet of the Sun
When light falls upon the wearer of this circlet inlaid with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest, the gold and rubies glow like the sun itself.
column3: Quand la lumière s'abat sur le porteur de cet anneau, l'or et les rubis brillent comme le soleil lui-même.
column4: Wenn Licht auf den Träger dieses Reifes fällt, leuchten das Gold und die Rubine wie die Sonne selbst.
column6: Cuando la luz ilumina al portador de esta diadema, el oro y los rubíes brillan como el mismísimo sol.

column2: Golden Staff
This gilded staff is covered in the most intricate engravings including the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Ce bâton doré est recouvert des gravures les plus complexes.
column4: Dieser vergoldete Stab ist mit unglaublich kunstvollen Gravuren bedeckt.
column6: Este bastón dorado está cubierto de elaboradísimos grabados.

column2: Circlet of Twilight
The circlet engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest is a beautiful silver hoop adorned with pyropes and pearls.
column3: L'anneau est un beau cercle d'argent orné de pyropes et de perles.
column4: Dieser wunderschöne Reif ist aus Silber angefertigt und mit Pyropen und Perlen geschmückt.
column6: Esta diadema es un precioso aro plateado adornado con piropos y perlas.

column2: Silver Staff
This silver staff is covered in the most intricate engravings including the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Ce bâton en argent est recouvert de gravures très complexes.
column4: Dieser silberne Stab ist mit unglaublich kunstvollen Gravuren bedeckt.
column6: Este bastón plateado está cubierto de elaboradísimos grabados.

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Crown of Crows

This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
column3: Ce chef-d'œuvre d'or est décoré de feuilles et de vignes en filigrane. Une douzaine de corbeaux étincelants aux yeux d'ambre sont perchés le long de la partie haute, leurs ailes écartées comme si elles étaient sur le point de s'envoler.
column4: Dieses goldene Meisterwerk ist mit filigranen Blättern und Reben verziert. Entlang des oberen Kronenrandes sitzen ein Dutzend schimmernde Krähen mit Bernsteinaugen und ausgebreiteten Flügeln, als stünden sie kurz davor, sich in die Lüfte zu schwingen.
column6: Esta obra maestra está decorada con filigranas de hojas y vides. Una docena de cuervos relucientes con ojos de ámbar están posados a lo largo de la parte superior y con las alas extendidas, como si estuvieran a punto de alzar el vuelo.

column2: Crown of the Sea
The peaks of the silver crown are shaped and engraved to look like the crest of waves engraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. A dozen pearls are spaced out evenly along the band.
column3: Les sommets de la couronne d'argent sont façonnés et gravés pour ressembler à la crête des vagues. Une douzaine de perles sont espacées uniformément le long de la bande.
column4: Die Zacken dieser silbernen Krone sind so geformt und graviert, dass sie wie Wellenkämme aussehen. Entlang des Bandes sind in gleichmäßigen Abständen ein Dutzend Perlen angebracht.
column6: Las puntas de esta corona de plata están talladas para asemejarse a las cresta de las olas. A lo largo de la banda hay colocada una docena de perlas, espaciadas entre ellas.

column2: Iron Crown

While this crown is not fashioned out of the noblest of materials, the craftsmanship is excellent. It is decorated with filigree in geometrical patterns, including the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and enhanced with pieces of silver.
column3: Bien que cette couronne ne soit pas façonnée à partir des matériaux les plus nobles, l'artisanat est excellent. Il est décoré de motifs géométriques en filigrane, agrémentés de morceaux d'argent.
column4: Diese Krone ist zwar nicht gerade aus den edelsten Materialien angefertigt, zeugt aber von einem hervorragenden handwerklichen Können. Sie ist mit Filigranarbeit in geometrischen Mustern verziert, die durch Stücke aus Silber veredelt wird.
column6: Aunque no está fabricada con los materiales más nobles, es una pieza de artesanía excelente. Está decorada con filigranas y patrones geométricos, realzados con piezas de plata.

column2: On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite axe. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite axe. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite crown. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] head it now serves as a constant reminder of him

On [FromFrom.GetHersHis] deathbed your [GetFromFromRelation] hands you [FromFrom.GetHersHis] favorite axe. Once a constant presence on [FromFrom.GetHersHis] hip it now serves as a constant reminder of him
Hero's Crown

The base of the crown is a heavy golden band, and each peak is shaped and engraved in the likeness of legendary warriors as well as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest. The centerpiece is a single, gleaming ruby.
column3: La base de la couronne est une lourde bande d'or, et chaque sommet est façonné et gravé à l'image des guerriers légendaires. La pièce maîtresse est un rubis unique, brillant.
column4: Die Basis dieser Krone bildet ein schweres Band aus Gold, und alle Zacken sind so geformt und graviert, dass sie wie legendäre Krieger aussehen. Das Kernstück ist ein einzelner gleißender Rubin.
column6: La base cuenta con una pesada tira de oro, y cada punta está formada y tallada para evocar a legendarios guerreros. En el centro hay un único rubí reluciente.

column2: Axe of the Ancestors
This gilded axe is engraved with pictures from the ancestral legends. Ambers are set in the handle.
column3: Cette hache dorée est gravée de scènes de légendes ancestrales. Les angles sont placés dans la poignée.
column4: In diese vergoldete Axt sind Bilder aus Legenden der Ahnen eingraviert, und ihr Griff ist mit Bernsteinbrocken besetzt.
column6: Esta hacha dorada tiene talladas imágenes de leyendas ancestrales. En la empuñadura luce varias piedras de ámbar.

column2: Amber Crown
This silver crown is decorated with engravings depicting the gods as well as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest and decorated with fine pieces of amber.
column3: Cette couronne d'argent est décorée de gravures représentant les dieux, et décorée de beaux morceaux d'ambre.
column4: Diese silberne Krone ist mit Gravuren der Götter und kostbaren Bernsteinbrocken verziert.
column6: Esta corona plateada está decorada con grabados que representan a los dioses y exquisitas piedras de ámbar.

column2: Obsidian Axe

The shape of this axe is simple because the material is impressive enough on its own. The head is made from the blackest and glossiest of obsidian egraved with the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: La forme de cette hache est simple parce que le matériau est assez impressionnant en lui-même. Le haut est fait de l'obsidienne la plus noire et la plus brillante.
column4: Die Form dieser Axt ist sehr schlicht, weil das Material allein schon eindrucksvoll genug ist. Der Kopf besteht aus tiefschwarzem, stark glänzendem Obsidian.
column6: La forma de esta hacha es sencilla porque el material es bastante impresionante de por sí. La cabeza está hecha de la obsidiana más negra y lustrosa.

column2: Engraved crown
This iron crown, while of a common material, is truly an impressive piece of craftsmanship with its detailed engravings of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Cette couronne, bien que créée avec des matériaux ordinaires, est vraiment une pièce d'artisanat impressionnante avec ses gravures détaillées.
column4: Diese eiserne Krone besteht zwar aus einem sehr gewöhnlichen Material, beeindruckt aber mit ihren detaillierten Gravuren durch das handwerkliche Können, mit dem sie angefertigt wurde.
column6: A pesar de estar hecha de un material común como el hierro, esta corona es una obra de artesanía impresionante por sus detallados grabados.

column2: Ceremonial Axe
A beautiful ceremonial axe set with polished colored stones depicting the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] family crest.
column3: Une belle hache de cérémonie avec des pierres colorées et polies.
column4: Eine schöne Zeremonienaxt, die mit polierten bunten Steinen besetzt ist.
column6: Una preciosa hacha ceremonial con piedras pulidas de distintos colores.
